seo.title: Corniglia Sights 2025 | What to See in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Top sights in Corniglia. Lardarina staircase, Santa Maria Belvedere church, panoramic terraces, vineyards, and authentic village atmosphere.

body.title: What to See in Corniglia
body.subtitle: Historic church, famous staircase, panoramic viewpoints, and terraced vineyards.

features.title: Lardarina Staircase
features.description: Iconic 382-step brick staircase built in 1875. The dramatic entrance to Corniglia from the train station.

features.title: Santa Maria Belvedere
features.description: 14th-century Gothic church with beautiful rose window. Simple elegant architecture on the main square.

features.title: Terrazza di Santa Maria
features.description: Panoramic terrace next to the church. Spectacular views of coastline and vineyards.

features.title: Terraced Vineyards
features.description: Ancient agricultural terraces surrounding the village. Walk among vines producing Vernaccia wine.

features.title: Via Fieschi
features.description: The narrow main street through Corniglia. Authentic village shops, cafes, and local life.

features.title: Belvedere Viewpoint
features.description: Western terrace for stunning sunset views. See Monterosso and Vernazza in the distance.
